website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Ideapad 110S is a frill-free $200 laptop that's good enough for basic use, but not much more. If you're on a shoestring budget, but need Windows, it's worth a look.
pros: Low price for a Windows laptop

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous little laptop
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lightweight netbook for my degree, and this had by far the best reviews. I now have to agree with them. It's light, the battery lasts ages, and it charges speedily. I have not had an issue with it running slow, but I don't store anything on it other than Word documents. I had some people tell me that if I tried to do more than one thing at a time on it, it would struggle to cope. As I write this I have 10 tabs, Word, and Outlook running. No issues at all. Great value laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: But for basic staff is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to be fast !! But for basic staff is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient space for a crucial update
customer_reviews.text: Initial looks were satisfactory. HOWEVER since two weeks after receipt a crucial update from windows was required for which there was insuffiencient space. Even after taking all my work and downloads off the system there was still insufficient space. I contacted a computer expert who spent considerable time going through the system - he explained I would never have enough room on the laptop for the crucial update. I now have to purchase another laptop as this is not stable.
customer_reviews.author: AO'duinn

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Among the many things wrong with this laptop, it was advertised to come with a 12 month office package, main reason who made me decide to buy it. It does not. Battery life is very, very short ( second reason ). It is light and handy and did not expect it to be fast, but disappointed about the above mentioned issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Very little memory, some Windows updates are not even possible to download. A product like this should not even be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for uni students
customer_reviews.text: This is a fab computer - perfect for any student. It can do all the word processing and is a fast little thing. Very light and portable. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's quite basic but great for those who just want a laptop for using ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my Mum and she loves it. It's quite basic but great for those who just want a laptop for using the internet or streaming tv shows and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible choice
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product in 4 days, it was a terrible choice. When I upload the system as required by Windows, I realized that with 32Gb there’s no enough space to install very simple programs like Microsoft Office, McAfee antivirus or Google Chrome. The computer became useless in less than one week!
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Amorim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This notepad exceeded my expectations, it is so handy and compact, totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for my 11 year old daughter who has just ...
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for my 11 year old daughter who has just started secondary school, particularly the office 365 subscription it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Friedner

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly impressed by this notebook, it is both quick and efficient in everything you would expect a laptop of this size to do. Sound quality is great and has no problems watching videos online. The only problem I can scrutinize is the keyboard as it is quite clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter to do her homework - but it is useless, fails to updates windows as there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my daughter to do her homework - but it is useless, fails to updates windows as there is no enough memory, the same with antivirus. She has problems to connect to the network all the time, and cant't save any files to the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Babs from Surrey

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - Laptop does NOT have a 500GB hard drive!
customer_reviews.text: Warning! The product description of this laptop is WRONG. This laptop does NOT have a 500GB hard drive. It only has the 32GB eMMC drive. If you need more than 32GB, then steer clear of this laptop. I have notified Amazon that they are wrongly advertising this laptop. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and is as advertised, but unfortunately the internal 32GB SD Drive is actually too small for the Windows 10 updates that have occurred since its launch.. Had to Purchas an additional SSD to go into the spare SDD slot to compensate. Hence the two stars for they neglect to mention this and they are aware of it..
customer_reviews.author: Joshy

customer_reviews.title: Not enough storage space
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! This product does not have enough storage space. It won't let you install updates because there is not enough free disk space, but won't let you delete programs because there's not enough free disk space. Work that one out! The item is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop but keep an eye on storage.
customer_reviews.text: Good little laptop for general web browsing, however be aware that Windows 10 with updates and backups can fill the disk space very quickly if you aren’t careful.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Win 10 = 1, Ubuntu = 5
customer_reviews.text: This is an average rating. For Windows, it scores 1 star. Win 10 asked me to update the SW as soon as I booted up. I did so and it crashed. I spent a couple of hours on the forums trying different things. Nothing. So I switched to Ubuntu. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pe9298

customer_reviews.title: Glorified tablet
customer_reviews.text: I needed one of these for a friend who was having issues. Turned out to be cheaper to buy a replacement than to fit a new motherboard. The rest has gone to recycling...
customer_reviews.author: m, a

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant but Microsoft too space hungry!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little machine - shame it has run out of space to update windows 10 despite following all the advice on the web, but it continues to serve its purpose which was note taking and homework for my grandson
customer_reviews.author: No1Granddad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase, it will be on its way to Morocco on Mon! I will relate any reviews to you when my fiance receives it.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline45

customer_reviews.title: shame, but no good
customer_reviews.text: this laptop got sent back, it barely functions before you try and do anything with it. I would only buy this for internet access and emails, nothing else
customer_reviews.author: Mr B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is typing lag. There doesn't appear to be anyway of speeding up keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Robert Feal-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for all my writing projects and browsing easy to use very slim unit and easy to travel ...
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for all my writing projects and browsing easy to use very slim unit and easy to travel with on the move very happy with price and quality...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Well Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for price. Set up was easy. I bought a 62 g SD card easy to install. This is perfect to sit on your lap in the armchair and use. Well pleased
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Buying a smart is better
customer_reviews.text: Lenovo failed here for me. I still have it but the space for this thing just shrink I had to compress everything in it to create space. Will save money and buy something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Msizi Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not much memory but worth every cent with the update feature turned off you can still operate normally
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very good, if any complaints it can run a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good, if any complaints it can run a little slow. I'm not exactly computer savvy but it does everything I need, internet browsing and FB word games etc.
customer_reviews.author: dawn beninson

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: My laptop has stoped working it turns itself of and on and can't get into any aps my request being completely ignored I would like a refund or replacement please
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this and bought it on warehouse, but came as good as new
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: better than many reviewers think
customer_reviews.text: working very well so far. no problems at all.... good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fredrick Norris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a simple home laptop and doing invoices
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a simple home laptop and doing invoices. Internal memory is something to be questioned! Used a USB stick to store any documents yet still not enough memory to do a simple software upgrade!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eamon Kilgannon

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for someone so I can't review it's operational performance. Adequate feedback but they were not overly enamored with the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item, fast delivery. Great starter notebook, lightweight and great resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I have had this product for a while. Keyboard is good. Screen quality is really good.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for every day work with an external memory attached. Easy to use keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Very good laptop, runs low on space due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop, runs low on space due to the amount of bloatware it does with. I advise buying a small sd card to add additional memory.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Massam

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Used mostly for general browsing and watching sky go. Works perfect and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S.R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value too
customer_reviews.text: Superb Notebook PC, does what it says on the tin, really delivers. Excellent value too, sits well amongst its peers. If I had one crtisicism it would be that the sound from the built in speakers even at full volume isn't that good. Other than that very good and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mrdepoinier

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for ... and whilst this is a nice little laptop it has a really, really annoying habit of the space bar only working if you push it quite hard, so when I'm touch typing I often have to backtrack and reinsert gaps between words. I bought it specifically to write on the move, so that's not a helpful characteristic at all. I've never had this problem with any other spacebar (even on manual typewriters) so I know it's a problem with this keyboard not my typing. I thought about returning it, but I've already done the downloads so can't be bothered with the hassle of deleting everything and starting again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: well received birthday pressy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She's probably had 5 or 6 laptops. This is what she said: "I really like it. It's already so much quicker than my old one! Easy peasy to set up... and wakes up well quickly. I also really like the red matte cover. Thanks!"
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the money but be aware once you ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for the money but be aware once you have Windows and Office installed you won't have a lot of hard drive space left - about 4gb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for her birthday and she loves it. It was very easy to srt up and to use
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Very basic, screen stopped working after 4 moths
customer_reviews.text: Screen stopped working after 4 months. To be fair, the returns was extremely simple and did a great job. However, I would also warn that this laptop is very basic - just having a few chrome tabs open (or a couple of PDFs) would almost grind it down to a halt. So probably not worth it if you need to do more than extremely basic tasks. Does look nice, is lightweight and probably a decent laptop for those doing the most basic of tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget a memory card!!
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my son's to do their homework on. Runs fast, battery lasts ages but has absolutely no memory!! Nearly half of the 30gb is used by the system & even deleting all the extra apps doesn't help!! Had to remove everything just to update Windows 10. Definately need to buy a high gb memory card to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but sometimes annoying
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little computer but at times the screen flashes black without reason and it really annoys me
customer_reviews.author: Sfirth

customer_reviews.title: ... of the Asus 11inch note book and just as bad, it's so slooow will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Just a clone of the Asus 11inch note book and just as bad ,it's so slooow will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mol

customer_reviews.title: Not a 4-core but a 2-core instead
customer_reviews.text: This IdeaPad 110S is advertised as having s quad-core processor but I actually discovered, through System Information to my dismay, that it is only dual-core. Which in turn explains why this machine, running Windows 10, is so painstakingly slow even for basic e-mail typing. It is portable enough and solidly built, and with a very competitive price for what it is, but whoever lists and sells this product should provide the correct information. If I had known this when I bought it I wouldn't have bothered and would have sought a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Spacefarer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all
customer_reviews.text: Literally the biggest pile of crap I’ve ever wasted my money on. No space for literally anything. Slow as hell for god knows what reason. Also it’s ridiculous that there’s only a 2 week return period -obviously don’t want to give you enough time to realise what an awful purchase that has been made. Feel like this laptop is literally a scam in itself & quite frankly, it just shouldn’t exist.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kids for their schoolwork, needed a memory card/flash drive to expand memory, but we have plenty of them lying around!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Brown

customer_reviews.title: Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and reliable service received very happy customer will recommend to friends and family
customer_reviews.author: tabatha hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: certain error due to slow processor and lack of memory
customer_reviews.author: David Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great condition laptop been looking for a small compact one for a long time and it's in my budget. Great price great condition and great delivery service too.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish so slow and software problems the third time turning it on! Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashely

customer_reviews.title: Bad! Seen better for that money.
customer_reviews.text: Hate it! Veryyy slow, you are very off using your phone to search for things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get something better, or a Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Simply put: not powerful enough to run Windows 10. The quad-core Celeron is barely enough for daily browsing, but the 2GB and 32GB of flash are not. I installed Linux on it, and even with Linux you have to choose a light distribution (I used Lubuntu) to get enough free memory. Also, the touchpad is very small and not very accurate. My advice is to forget these kind of subnotebooks. If you just have to browse the internet, watch netflix etc, maybe when traveling, get a Chromebook with touch screen (see the Acer R11, for example). If you have to seriously use Windows, don't waste your money. Spend more, but get a decent laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're buying!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little laptop. I do, however, think people need to know what they are buying. This is a cheap lap top, it cannot process a lot and does struggle with doing a lot of things at once. If you know that and still want it, it's lovely! Great design, very light, works incredibly well. I only ever have a hard time with it when I have more than three things open (Chrome, Word and SPSS for example). But I am very glad I bought this and really recommend it especially for how cheap it is.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for accessing emails, documents and browsing on the go.
customer_reviews.text: This little device ticks all of the boxes for me. It's light, portable, a fast performer for basic tasks and the battery life is excellent. I needed a device with a physical keyboard that would enable me to access my documents on the cloud and that I could carry around with me all day long to record notes from workplace meetings. This does the job perfectly, with a surprisingly speedy performance and a solid battery life that gets me through the day. I picked this up as an open box return via Amazon Warehouse Deals and am very pleased to have done so. A recommended buy, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Walker

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is by a long way the nastiest laptop I have ever owned. The keypad is horribly plastic, with far too much give in the sheet holding the keys - like typing on a hammock. It is also slightly too big to be really useful. And it is very underpowered. Windows 10 takes nearly its whole power. I bought it to replace an Ideapad Flex 10, but it is nothing like as robust a machine. I made the huge mistake of buying two of these at the same time. I have been using ThinkPads for years, but will be very hard to encourage to buy another one after this experience. I am replacing it as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get on the internet, wished I never brought this product. Money down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lesley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is best laptop I have ever seen. Doing a good job. You forgot to include a receipt could You please send it to me. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: petronilla

customer_reviews.title: Got laptop on friday and by the Wednesday the laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: Got laptop on friday and by the Wednesday the laptop has now stopped working and screan isn't showing anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just avoid it
customer_reviews.text: I would avoid this - it was bought to replace an 100s that got battered but its been nothing but trouble. it worked for a week but now keeps losing wifi for a few seconds and once or twice a day wi-fi disappears completely - not just the signal but any reference to wifi and some but not all functions are locked (you can't open anything in device manager). Ironically the 100S is still quite happily working while this happens. I've spent a week trying to resolve it by installing and reinstalling and it isn't worth the grief just avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: j47

customer_reviews.title: rubbish laptop - do nto buy
customer_reviews.text: Firstly the wifi keeps dropping for no known reason, which makes it very difficult to work. The key board is bouncy - impossible to speed type. Finally after a week of trying to activate office 365 I gave up. Returning this piece of rubbish to vendor. As for tryng to get Microsoft to help with support - what a joke! Their systems are set up to make it impossible to contact them...
customer_reviews.author: Breffni

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to do his homework on,I didn't have high expectations based on previous experiences with windows notebooks.Very slow and unresponsive,as I had envisaged;just wish I'd listened to my gut instinct and not bothered.Save up and buy a MacBook,they last years and are virtually problem free.
customer_reviews.author: Annomous

product_meta.title: Lenovo IdeaPad 110S 11.6-Inch Notebook - (Silver) (Intel Celeron N3160, 2 GB RAM, 32 GB eMMC, Windows 10) + Office 365 12 Month Subscription
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:SilverSIMPLICITY MEETS RELIABILITY AND VALUE. Combining high-performance with a reliable Intel Celeron N3160 CPU, this 11" device delivers crisp, high-definition visuals, in a sleek, robust, lightweight shell—this laptop can do what you want, wherever you are.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x IdeaPad 110S
AC adapter
User manual
feature_bullets: Incredibly Easy-to-Use. From the moment you open the box, the IdeaPad 110S laptop has everything you need and nothing you don’t.
Windows 10 delivers a refined, vastly improved vision for the future of computing.
Crystal Clear Display. Say goodbye to standard definition. The IdeaPad 110S can be configured with an HD display that delivers vibrant, sharp visuals.
Dependable Performance. Fitted with Intel Celeron N3160 processor, your IdeaPad 110S operates with smooth efficiency.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars145 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
